metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18650 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.00. XRef::readXRefStream in XRef.ccallows attackers to launch a denial of service (Integer Overflow) via acrafted /Size value in a pdf file, as demonstrated by pdftohtml. This ismainly caused by the program attempting a malloc operation for a largeamount of memory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18650` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xpdf - 3.03-17
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: xpdf package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.03-17').
ipe package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
